modal.message: Warning! Your account will be deleted, are you sure about that?

section-1.title: Photosensitivity / epileptic seizures:
section-1.content: A very small percentage of individuals may experience epileptic seizures when exposed to certain light patterns or flashing lights. Exposure to certain patterns or backgrounds on a computer screen, or while playing video games, may induce an epileptic seizure in these individuals. Certain conditions may induce previously undetected epileptic symptoms even in persons who have no history of prior seizures or epilepsy. If you, or anyone in your family, have an epileptic condition, consult your physician prior to playing. If you experience any of the following symptoms while playing a video or computer game -- dizziness, altered vision, eye or muscle twitches, loss of awareness, disorientation, any involuntary movement, or convulsions - IMMEDIATELY discontinue use and consult your physician before resuming play.

section-2.title: Tips for use of video games to reduce epileptic seizures and other health concerns:

list.text-1: Consult your doctor before playing if you have serious medical conditions, if you are pregnant or elderly, or if you have an implanted medical device
list.text-2: Avoid playing when you are sick, tired, and/or under the influence of medicine or drugs
list.text-3: Keep your eyes as far away as possible from the screen
list.text-4: Do not use earphones at a high volume as hearing loss may occur
list.text-5: Play in a comfortable posture to avoid numbness, stiffness or other discomfort
list.text-6: Take regular breaks during play sessions. The length and frequency of necessary breaks may vary from one person to another
list.text-7: Stop playing if you are experiencing any discomfort

modal.title: Instructions:

list.text-1: Wait for the red pointer to appear.
list.text-2: Calibrate your points by clicking several times on the hexagons and focusing on the mouse cursor. It will turn blue when the point is calibrated.
list.text-3: Once your calibration suits you, press Done or restart the configuration.

modal.message: Attention! Keep your face in the same configuration when you start the game.

messages.save-score: You scored {{score}} points. Saving in progress...
